H0.text: Which island group became known as The Friendly Islands. Samoa

H1.text: Which island group became known as The Friendly Islands. Fiji

H2.text: Which island group became known as The Friendly Islands. Vanuatu

H3.text: Which island group became known as The Friendly Islands. Tonga

A4.text: Tonga became known in the West as the 'Friendly Islands' because of the congenial reception accorded to Captain James Cook on his first visit in 1773.
